resources.string: Select node automatically based on latency.
Show network and wallet state in action bar.
Add this account for observing only without account permissions.
Wallet is corrupted and need to reset
Delete all accounts and create a new wallet.
Are you sure to delete all accounts and create a new wallet?
Are you sure to remove this user and all its keys?
Wallet is encrypted and stored in local database, any changes to it outside this app may corrupt the wallet.
Unlock wallet to take control of accounts
Encrypt your backup file with password.
Cannot create wallet backup, please retry.
Decrypt your backup file with password.
Cannot restore from this backup, please retry.
Please save the text of your encrypted wallet backup.
Wallet is corrupted, please reset it.
Minimal weight to take control over the account.
Minimal weight to spend funds for this account.
Minimal weight to decrypt memo in transaction.
Owner permissions define who has control over the account and, overwrite all keys and change any account settings.
Active permissions define who has permission to spend funds for this account.
Memo permissions define who can decrypt and check memo message in transactions.
Are you sure to remove this active/owner/memo key auth?
Are you sure to remove this active/owner account auth?

If you replace the memo key you will be unable to read old memos when logging in with your password, and unless you import the new memo private key into your old wallet that wallet will be unable to decode new memos.
Owner permissions weights total of %1$s should be equal or exceed threshold of %2$s.
Active permissions weights total of %1$s should be equal or exceed threshold of %2$s.
Memo permission should contain at least one key.
User keys is insufficient, please add more keys to keychain to take full control of this account.
User is not found in database
Unlock wallet to change local keys
Passcode should contain at least 6 digits
Unlock wallet to modify black list
Name list has been changed, are you sure to leave without broadcast?
Are you sure to remove this account from whitelist?
Are you sure to remove this account from blacklist?
Are you sure to clear all blockchain caches?
Are you sure to leave without broadcast?
Keys required to sign this transaction is insufficient.
Owner keys required to sign this transaction is insufficient.
Active keys required to sign this transaction is insufficient.
Add or remove account to observe list
Connection to blockchain node is lost, please check your connection state
Account is not found in blockchain
You have a proxy set, change voting list will remove your current proxy.
Search for an account to be used as your proxy for voting. Your account will act as if you would be voting exactly the same as your proxy.
The fee pool is used to pay fees in %1$s by converting the fee in %2$s to %1$s. If the fee pool runs out of funds, fees may no longer be paid in %2$s and will default to %1$s.
This operation is not supported yet
%1$s claimed asset fees of %3$s from %2$s fee pool
%1$s updated the bitasset data for the asset %2$s
%1$s updated the feed producers for the asset %2$s
%1$s changed %3$s debt by %2$s and collateral by %4$s
%1$s added %2$s seconds to redeem period of %3$s
%1$s was upgraded to become a witness
Password should be at least 6 digits
Account name should be %1$s including %2$s and %3$s.
Account name should not end with a dash.
Are you sure to remove market %1$s?
Your collateral ratio is below %1$s which is not allowed.
Your collateral ratio is close to %1$s, this position is in danger of being margin called if the price of %2$s drops.
Your collateral ratio is below required %1$s! Increasing collateral ratio is allowed, debt can only be decreased.
Your collateral ratio is below your original %1$s! Only increased ratio is allowed on margin called orders.

Update your %1$s margin position by adjusting the debt and collateral levels.\n\nCollateral and debt levels can be adjusted in any way you desire, as long as your collateral ratio stays above the maintenance collateral ratio of %3$s.
